info?: string[]; color: string; } export default function IconsWithTooltips() { const setMounted = useState(false)[1]; // Ensure tooltips work only on client side useEffect(() => { setMounted(true); }, []); const iconFeatures: IconFeature[] = [ { id: "security", name: "Enterprise Security", icon: , description: "Military-grade protection for your most sensitive data", highlight: "SOC 2 Type II
